full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Contract Title and Reference

47419-238857 - Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) Guard Services - Quebec Region

Reference Number: WS3866550805
Solicitation Number: WS3866550805

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Date: **2023-02-16**
* Tender Closing Date: **2023-03-13T14:00:00**
* Amendment Date: **2023-03-09**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-07-01**
* Expected Contract End Date: **None**
* Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

## Procurement Information

* Tender Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Tender Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Service Requirement

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking Guard Services in Quebec, as defined in Annex A - Statement of Work.

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing care and control of immigration detainees, safe and secure transportation of detainees, verification of departure of persons from Canada who are under a removal order pursuant to the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) or who are otherwise required to leave Canada, and performing other duties as described in Annex A.

## Tender Documents and Submission Instructions

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by **2023-03-13** at **14:00 EDT**. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Grozdanovski, Tase (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [tase.grozdanovski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tase.grozdanovski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

## Notice and Supporting Documents

* Tender Notice: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15445482?extsite=MTU0NDU0ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Supporting Documents: Not available

**Please submit your tender response by** **2023-03-13T14:00:00** **
